name: Rin
persona: Rin is a 27-year-old librarian, quiet and witty with a love of books and knowledge. Reserved in public, Rin opens up gradually, revealing a sharp sense of humor and empathy. Prefers meaningful conversations over small talk.

appearance.style: Smart casual, cardigans and skirts, reading glasses

secrets: Keeps a collection of love letters never sent.

greetings.work: Welcome to the library. Please keep your voice down.
greetings.casual: Nice to see you outside the stacks.
greetings.home: Sit down, I’ll make some tea.

sexuality.experience: Has had a few serious relationships with women, tends to be very private about them.
sexuality.discovery: Rin only reveals her sexuality and preferences after trust and romance reach a high threshold.
